StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
Work Experience Summary: 6.1 years of Total Experience in IT Software Testing
6.1 years of IT experience in Functional, Agile, SOA, Webservices and Manual Testing.

PositionHistory.Title: Onsite Test Lead
PositionHistory.Description:
Project: FedEx Pricing eDD
eDD (Enterprise Discount Database) stores the various forms of discounts for a customer as per eligibility of a proposed agreement and Invoices the customer to store the information in an implementation engine. Responsibilities: Project Scope Analysis, Estimations, Scheduling, Tracking, Project Management Agile Test Planning/ Strategy Preparation, contribution to Scrum Meetings and User stories Look for process improvements & cost savings Training on Virtualized Simulation planning of databases using iTKO LISA tool (Beginner Level) Ensuring all deadlines are met for all deliverables in a timely manner Offshore query resolution and reviewing offshore deliverables Assist other fellow Project leads on Test Planning and strategy study Project status reporting to offshore and onsite Managers and Directors Capturing various metrics and analysis Defects and Cause analysis, preparation of Test summary report Schedule/monitor project level inductions for newly joined associates Contribution towards training & mentoring team members on testing concepts and Logistics domain Creation of Traceability matrix to ensure test coverage Prepare test conditions, design test cases and Execution using FedEx Tools, Unix scripts, SOAP UI tool Resource Allocation, Mitigation and Contingency planning, Coordination Received Client appreciations for successful and timely deliverables Environment: SOAP UI 4.5, UNIX, Quality Center 11.0, MS Access, SQL, Agile Methodologies, Training on iTKO LISA Tool, MS Excel and Document Reporting, Caliber RM, Webserver Logic Console, FedEx Shipment Tools

PositionHistory.Title: Analyst Programmer
PositionHistory.Description:
Project: FedEx RADAR
Responsibilities:
Real-Time Accurate Dynamic Area Reporting (RADAR) to track the shipments in transit Preparation of test cases and procedures for new requirements Coordination with onsite counterpart and Client Interaction Execution of the UNIX scripts for loading the data Execution of Business Process Tools (BPTs) for Automated test cases Test data creation for shipments, apply scans with details and execution Defect analysis and follow up Coordination with onsite counterpart and Client Interaction Preparation and Analysis of reports for executed test-cases and failure analysis Highly appreciated by Client for timely deliverables and accurate reporting
Environment: UNIX, Quality Center 11.0, MS Access, SQL, MS Excel and Document Reporting, Caliber RM, Webserver Logic Console, FedEx Shipment Tools

PositionHistory.Title: Analyst Programmer
PositionHistory.Description:
Project: FedEx QTE Shipment Systems
Responsibilities:
People management Prepare weekly, monthly reports and other reporting activities Coordination with onsite counterpart and Client Interaction Execution of the UNIX scripts for loading the shipment data Generating CSV reports and converting the generated CSV reports to excel sheet for analysis purpose Developed a shell script to pull the relationship airbills Analysis of SRS to develop and execute test-cases as per requirement Test data creation and execution for shipments Preparation and Analysis of reports for executed test-cases and failure analysis Recording test results for analysis and generation of reports for status on different environments Preparation of Test Plan, Task tracking, review of all deliverables to maintain the standard of test artifacts Effective contribution in preparation of test strategy and tracking of Testing milestones Ensure Minimal or 0% Defect Leakage in production after every build testing Defect tracking and management Coordination with various client personnel, onshore and offshore for faster defect resolutions Participating in defect and review comments analysis Mentoring Onsite and offshore team members Project Status Reporting to Client Metrics analysis and implementing corrective action for future releases
Environment: UNIX, Quality Center 11.0, MS Access, SQL, MS Excel and Document Reporting, Caliber RM, Webserver Logic Console, FedEx Shipment Tools

PositionHistory.Title: business applications
PositionHistory.Description:
FedEx Services - Federal Express Corporation Orlando, FL
FedEx provides customers and businesses worldwide with a broad portfolio of transportation, e-commerce and business services. FedEx offers integrated business applications through operating companies competing collectively and managed collaboratively, under the respected FedEx brand.

PositionHistory.Title: Analyst Programmer
Software Testing Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
Projects Worked On: Indian Rally, Indian Tourism and Property Instant Responsibilities:- Manual Regression Testing. Involved in Requirement Analysis. Preparation of Test Cases. Involved in Quality Management work of the project. Testing activities covered front end testing of the user interface, business logic and functionality of the modules in the application. The activities included Development of condensed and detailed test scenarios, preparation of test data and test scripts. Front end testing of the products and identification of bugs and reporting using Bugzilla Tool. Preparation and Enhancement of test cases as per functionalities for performing Manual Testing. Documenting test cases, Test Results, and creation of Bug Reports. Preparation, Review and Execution of Test Cases against Functional Specifications. Testing activities covered front end testing of the user interface, business logic and functionality of the modules in the application. Identification of bugs by creating fruitful test scenarios and appropriate reporting.
Environment: UNIX, Quality Center 11.0, MS Access, SQL, MS Excel and Document Reporting, Caliber

SchoolOrInstitution.Comments: High School education with First Class from I.S.C.E. Board, New Delhi, India

Competency.name: testing of the products and identification
preparation of test data and test scripts
Preparation of test cases and procedures
Bachelors Degree > Bachelor of Engineering > Bachelor of Engineering Electronics

CompetencyEvidence.name: Alias
CompetencyEvidence.StringValue: Education: Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) in Electronics and Communication

Competency.name: Bachelors Degree > Bachelor of Engineering > Bachelor of Engineering Communication

CompetencyEvidence.name: Alias
CompetencyEvidence.StringValue: Education: Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) in Electronics and Communication

NonXMLResume.TextResume:
{{DOCUMENT_DATESTAMP}} 2013-07-17 {{END_DOCUMENT_DATESTAMP}}
ABHIK Contact #: (323) 963-0149 Email: alok@cedentinc.com - email: alok@cedentinc.com
Work Experience Summary: 6.1 years of Total Experience in IT Software Testing
6.1 years of IT experience in Functional, Agile,SOA, Webservices andManual Testing.
Professional Experience
* Currently working as an Analyst Programmer for the past2 years and 10 months. ; * Extensive experience as a Test lead as part of onsite testing teams. ; * Experience of working with global clients which are into Logistics like FedEx (Federal Express Corporation) ; * Experience in Logistics domain. Complete understanding of Shipment Cycle using FedEx applications and Testing Tools. ; * Good understanding ofSoftware testing, Quality processes and practices. Testing experience includesRequirement gathering,Requirement analysis, Designing Test Plan/Strategy, Test Estimation, Preparing Functional Test Summary Report, Release Metrics, Preparing Test Conditions, Traceability Matrix, Test Cases and Reviewing work products, End-To-End scenario preparation, Defect logging, Tracking and co-ordination with Offshore Team. ; * Experience inSOA Testing,Agile Testing,Manual testing, System Integration testing, Functional testing, Regression testing,Smoke testing, Black Box Testing and Web services Testing. ; * Sound knowledge of various phases of Software Testing Life Cycle. Awareness of entry and exit criteria for deliverables for all testing phases. ; * Preparing Test plan, Effort estimation, Resource loading, Task allocation, Daily task tracking,Test case design, Offshore deliverables review, Test execution, Defect tracking & management, Status reporting and Metrics preparation.
Certification: CSTE (Certified Software Tester)
Education: Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) in Electronics and Communication
Technical Skills
Operating Systems Windows XP/7, UNIX Webservice Testing Tools SOAP UI 4.5, iTKO LISA (Beginner Level) Test Management Tool HP Quality Center 11.0, Caliber RM Languages Understanding of C Database MS- Access, SQL
Project Experience:

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: This candidate has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 9 years. During this candidate's last employment this candidate was working as an Analyst Programmer. This candidate has extensive knowledge of UNIX, SQL, Microsoft Access, Mercury Quality Center, Web Services, Microsoft Excel, Manual Testing, Service Oriented Architecture, Regression Testing, Bugzilla, Black-Box Testing. This candidate has some experience in managment (7 months).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Currently since 2013-01 the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Onsite Test Lead.
